data.actual_result: The button "View in Store" is visible, selecting it just reloads the Activity tab.
data.expected_result: If the user does not have access to the store, there should not be anything in that context menu.
data.short_description: "View in Store" is avaliable on the context menu for certain games even if you don't have access to the store.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Activity tab. - Find a game that is a beta game for the Discord store. (i.e. Hollow Knight) - Right click on the name of the game. - Observe the "View in Store" button.
